title: SEIA elects new board chair, board members to spearhead American solar + storage progress
description: Scott Moskowitz of Qcells was elected chair of the Solar Energy Industries Association Board, with Dr. Ingmar Ritzenhofen as vice chair.
content: Scott Moskowitz of Qcells was elected chair of the Solar Energy Industries Association Board, with Dr. Ingmar Ritzenhofen as vice chair.
